plot: A detective chases crooks who posed as maid and inspector to steal a lord's diamond.
title: Detective Finn, or, in the Heart of London
plot_es: A detective chases crooks who posed as maid and inspector to steal a lord's diamond.
original_name: Detective Finn, or, in the Heart of London
plot_en: A detective chases crooks who posed as maid and inspector to steal a lord's diamond.
